title: AppBuzz
description:
Appbuzz is a game-changing tool that transforms your e-commerce site into a feature-rich mobile app in seconds. No coding skills are required, and there is no lengthy development process – just instant results.

But Appbuzz doesn't stop there. We supercharge your new app with powerful features designed to boost your sales and customer engagement.

Increase conversion rates, AOVs, repeat purchase rates with features like AI powered push notifications, abandoned cart campaigns, analytics and more
